attributes.action: Encourage people to smoke and participate in other hazardous activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We can't afford to support all the old people. We need a few more to die off through "Natural selection" The average life expectancy of a person in the U.K. is far too high for us to support. The NHS should not provide life extending treatment to over 40's only pain relief.
